My Portfolio APIs project Blogr's Page

OR

Topic discussion chat app

Hi there, my name is Muhammad Owais & I am a frontend developer. Today I wanna discuss about my chat app which I was working on for a while . I created this app for my class , the purpose of creating this app is to share a knowledge which I have or giving "Pro Topics / Articles" reference with a little bit information which I think is very necessary for a computer Science student. In the app , I will post a topic which will be related to current technology & will discuss why this is so much important & what will be the authentic/standard way to learn more about this. There are a lot more to discuss but the purpose of this app is to make a IT students too informative so that he/she can know that where the technology is going & can decide which field of "IT" is very best for him/her. From time to time we will post different Topics related to IT. And one of the most important thing , you can ask any question related to topic or if you have already have a knowledge about given topic than you can share with us more in the comment section.

How To Use This App

So , how should you use this web app , this is very easy , first of all you can read the topic but in order to give any comments ,see other people comments, ask any question or give more info about the topic , you will need to create a account in here or logIn with google. So here are the steps to follow.

    There are two methods to logIn First is "GoogleSignIn"
  • At the top in the navbar click on SignIn button
  • A popup will open-up click on "signIn with google" button at the bottom of pop-up
    • In this way you can easily logIn your account with google. The other method is "email/password".
  • For this first of all click on "SignUp" button in the navbar , give valid email & password
  • After submission you will be successfully loggedIn
  • And whenever you will need to signIn you can use this email/password by clicking on "SignIn" button , enter email/password in the pop-up box & click on "Submit" button.
